name: UpdateTimeEntry
description: Use this endpoint to update a single Time entry.

activityNumber.description:
The activity identifier of time entry.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false
activityNumber.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

date.description:
The date of time entry.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false
date.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

employeeNumber.description:
The employee identifier of time entry.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false
employeeNumber.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

isApproved.description:
Bool value specifying if the time entry was approved. If time entry was approved, it can not be updated anymore.

Read-only: true

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false
isApproved.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

isReconciled.description:
Bool value specifying if the time entry was reconciled.

Read-only: true

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false
isReconciled.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

lastUpdated.description:
The time entry last updated date.

Read-only: true

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

Sortable: false
lastUpdated.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte

number.description:
The time entry identifier.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: true
number.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

numberOfHours.description:
Number of hours of time entry.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false
numberOfHours.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

objectVersion.description:
The object version, required for PUT requests.

Filterable: not filterable

Sortable: false

projectNumber.description:
The project identifier of time entry.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

Sortable: false
projectNumber.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin

text.description:
Text description of time entry.

Filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin, like

Sortable: false
text.x-filterable: eq, ne, lt, lte, gt, gte, in, nin, like
